attributes.action: Tax on more than 2 properties or more.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it becomes harder for 1st time buyers to purchase, tax on residential property for letting/renting should be created as a seperate income unless it is a merger of two families in which they wish to retain an original family home for the benifit of the 1st generation of children.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Tax on more than 2 properties or more."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12830.asp

Prime Minister's Office
